title: Critical Bug Fixes and Metadata Updates
Add MIT LICENSE file to repository
description: Add LICENSE file with MIT license text to match package.json license field

title: Remove main.js from git tracking
description: Remove the 50KB main.js from git history as it's a build artifact that should not be tracked (already in .gitignore)

title: Add Settings and Configuration Options
description: Implement SettingTab to allow user configuration including directory exclusion, sub-bullet hiding, and custom task status support. Addresses GitHub issues #22, #9, and #19.

title: Implement SettingTab with basic UI
description: Create SettingTab class and register it with the plugin. Add basic UI structure for settings panel.

title: Add directory exclusion setting
description: Allow users to specify directories to exclude from task hiding. Addresses GitHub issue #22.

title: Add option to hide sub-bullets
description: Add setting to hide sub-bullets of completed tasks. Addresses GitHub issue #9.

title: Support custom task statuses
description: Allow users to configure which task statuses to hide (e.g., [x], [>], [-]). Addresses GitHub issue #19.

title: Improve Documentation
description: Expand README with development setup instructions, contribution guidelines, feature screenshots, and API version information to help users and contributors.

title: Add development setup guide to README
description: Document how to set up local development environment, build the plugin, and test in Obsidian vault.

title: Add contribution guidelines
description: Create CONTRIBUTING.md with guidelines for pull requests, code style, and testing requirements.

title: Fix CSS syntax error in styles.css
description: Remove malformed }"]) characters from line 5 of styles.css that are causing CSS parsing errors

title: Add feature screenshots and demos
description: Add screenshots showing the plugin in action, settings panel, and before/after examples.

title: Document API version and compatibility
description: Add information about Obsidian API version, minimum app version, and compatibility notes to README.

title: Fix iOS plugin load issue
description: Plugin is not enabled on load on iOS - needs to be disabled/re-enabled manually. Investigate state persistence on mobile. GitHub issue #1

title: Add option to hide status bar message
description: Allow users to optionally hide the status bar message to reduce clutter. GitHub issue #2

title: Fix plugin hiding non-completed task statuses
description: Plugin currently hides all task statuses like [?] and [!], not just completed [x]. Should only hide completed tasks by default. Related to GitHub issues #3, #13, #19

title: Add sequential task mode feature
description: New mode: show only the first incomplete task, hide all completed and subsequent incomplete tasks. GitHub issue #10

title: Add Kanban plugin integration
description: Support hiding completed tasks in Kanban boards. Requires investigation of obsidian-kanban plugin API. GitHub issue #26

title: Release v1.0.6
description: Cut release v1.0.6 with critical bug fixes and infrastructure modernization. Includes CSS fixes, error handling, dependency updates, GitHub Actions modernization, and LICENSE file.

title: Review release.sh for security, robustness, bugs, and improvements.
description: Perform a detailed review of release.sh script for security vulnerabilities, robustness issues, bugs, and suggest improvements.

title: Release v1.0.7
description: Cut release v1.0.7 with critical bug fix for custom task statuses. Fixes GH #3, #13, #19 where plugin was hiding all non-empty task statuses instead of just [x].

title: Update package.json metadata to match manifest.json
description: Update name, version, description, and author in package.json to match the actual plugin details from manifest.json

title: Add option to hide status bar message
description: Allow users to optionally hide the status bar message to reduce clutter. Part of SettingTab configuration. GitHub issue #2

title: Fix line numbers still showing for hidden tasks (GitHub #28)
description: Line numbers in the gutter are still visible for hidden tasks in edit mode, causing squished appearance. Need to also apply display: none to gutter elements. See GitHub issue #28.

title: Implement proper CodeMirror 6 line hiding using StateField and Decoration.replace()
description: Replace the current CSS-based approach with proper CodeMirror 6 decorations. Use StateField to provide Decoration.replace() for hiding completed tasks and sub-bullets. This will properly hide both content and line numbers, make hidden content non-interactive, and maintain accurate absolute line numbering.

title: Create StateField to track which lines should be hidden
description: Create a StateField that examines the document and identifies: 1) Completed task lines [x] and [X] when hiddenState is true, 2) Sub-bullet lines beneath completed tasks when hideSubBullets is true. The field should maintain a list of line ranges to hide.

title: Implement Decoration.replace() for hiding line ranges
description: Build RangeSet of Decoration.replace() decorations for each line range that should be hidden. Decorations must span from line start to after the line break to properly hide both content and line numbers. Use RangeSetBuilder to construct the decoration set efficiently.

title: Create facet for plugin settings integration
description: Create a Facet to provide plugin settings (hiddenState, hideSubBullets) to the CodeMirror extension. This allows the StateField to react to setting changes and update decorations accordingly.

title: Register CodeMirror extension with registerEditorExtension()
description: Register the StateField and settings facet as a CodeMirror extension using Obsidian's registerEditorExtension() API. Handle extension lifecycle (load/unload) properly. Update settings changes to dispatch effects that reconfigure the extension.

title: Remove old CSS and JavaScript-based line hiding code
description: Clean up the old implementation: remove CSS rules for hiding lines, remove JavaScript methods (hideGutterElementForLine, restoreGutterElements, hideCompletedTaskGutters, updateNestedItemVisibility), remove mutation observer code. Keep only the toggle functionality.

title: Test line hiding with user's example and edge cases
description: Test with the user's Thursday Morning Checklist example. Verify: 1) Line numbers display correctly without gaps, 2) Hidden lines are non-interactive, 3) Absolute line numbering works, 4) Toggle on/off works properly, 5) Sub-bullets hide/show correctly, 6) Edge cases like nested sub-bullets and mixed task statuses.

title: v1.0.8 breaks nested bullet visibility - Level 2 bullets hidden when Level 3 exists
description: Latest version (1.0.8) hides text at 2-indent levels when there's a 3-level indented block below it. Content is not collapsed, just not displayed. Reproduced with all other plugins disabled. Regression from 1.0.7.

title: Add error handling to loadHiddenState method
description: Add try-catch blocks to loadHiddenState() method in main.ts to handle corrupted data gracefully

title: Remove console.log statements from production code
description: Remove console.log statements from main.ts lines 31 and 50, or replace with Obsidian's Notice API if user feedback is needed

title: Fix hidden line numbers issue in edit mode
description: Line numbers for hidden completed tasks still display in edit mode, causing visual gaps. Need to update CSS to hide line numbers for completed tasks. Related to GitHub issue #28

title: Modernize Dependencies and Tooling
description: Update project dependencies, GitHub Actions, add LICENSE file, and clean up git tracking to bring the project up to current standards

title: Update all npm dependencies to current versions
description: Update TypeScript 4.0.3 to 5.x, Rollup plugins from 2020 to latest, @types/node v14 to latest, and obsidian API from master tarball to specific version

title: Modernize GitHub Actions workflow
description: Update from deprecated actions/checkout@v2 to v4, actions/setup-node@v1 to v4, replace deprecated actions/create-release and upload-release-asset, update Node.js 15.x to LTS, fix deprecated set-output command
